thread.title: Karl Stefanovic and girlfriend Jasmine Yarbrough spotted eating McDonalds: Photos
thread.title_full: Karl Stefanovic and girlfriend Jasmine Yarbrough spotted eating McDonalds: Photos

author: news.com.au
title: Karl Stefanovic and girlfriend Jasmine Yarbrough spotted eating McDonalds: Photos
text:
KARL Stefanovic has been spotted grabbing a bite to eat and having a laugh with his rumoured, new girlfriend Jasmine Yarbrough. 
The pair were photographed buying some McDonalds before they returned to the luxurious QT Hotel in Bondi.
Stefanovic pictured out and about in Bondi with his new girlfriend Jasmine Yarbrough. Source: Matrix Media Group 
The photos come a little over a week since sources told Fairfax Stefanovic’s family found out about the new relationship when they saw paparazzi pictures of the two kissing on a super yacht in Sydney.
“At no point before it was released in the media did Karl tell [his wife] Cassandra or the children he was in a relationship and that he wanted his girlfriend to meet them,” the source said on February 21. 
Stefanovic and Yarbrough cross the road with a McDonalds bag in hand. Source: Matrix Media Group 
Stefanovic was spotted wearing a pair of black Birkenstocks, which seem to be the TV host’s favourite form of footwear.
In December, the journalist uploaded a photo to his Instagram account of a Friday night in with the cricket front and centre while boasting a stylish outfit of grey trackpants and his Birkenstock sandals.

Stefanovic looking grim-faced in his signature Birkenstocks. Source: Matrix Media Group 


Yarbrough, who is a 33-year-old shoe designer known globally for her fashion brand Max & Mara wore a bright floral skirt and white wrap around top with a pair of her shoes.
The luxury slip-on shoes have become must-have footwear for stars including Kendall Jenner and Margot Robbie.
Yarbrough out and about in Bondi. Source: Matrix Media Group 
Stefanovic split from his wife Cassandra Thorburn back in October after 21 years of marriage and reportedly due to the toll The Today Show took on their family.
The new couple out in Bondi before heading back to their hotel. Source: Matrix Media Group 
Stefanovic has remained pretty tight-lipped about his private life since the split, but recently opened up to the Herald Sun about the toll it’s taken on his family.
“For me personally I would definitely have failures in a husband sense and hope that I can rectify my failures as a dad,” Karl told the publication.
“I hope I can try and rebuild whatever has happened in the past and try and make the most of what I can do with them in the future.”
Stefanovic and Thorburn have three kids together: Jackson, 16, Ava, 11, and River, 10.
The first time Stefanovic and Yarbrough were pictured together after getting off the super yacht in Sydney. Source: The Daily Telegraph
